name: Sands of Scorpio Demo
description:
Sands of Scorpio is a 2.5D metroidvania with a zodiac theme in which you play as a scorpion in the kingdom of Scorpio, who must explore the desert to find and free the other 11 zodiac lords from a great darkness known only as the Void.

Controls
A and D or Arrow keys:  Move left/right
Left Control:  Dash
Space:  Jump
Z:  Attack
E:  Interact
W or Up Arrow:  Wall  climb (when touching wall, only once found power up)

P:  Set checkpoint (you will be returned to this location when you die)

Music used in the demo by: Tyler Cunningham
https://tylercunningham.bandcamp.com/

Sound effects by Mike Koenig , Marianne Gagnon, and Cam.  

I want to make Sands of Scorpio the best game it can possibly be and for that Your input is invaluable
Please visit the discussion board below to leave  feedback or suggestions
